mapper.select: select count(*) from reviews where review_id > 0

select review_id,regdate,contents,product_id,member_id from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(reviews review_id)*/ rownum rn,review_id,regdate,contents,product_id,member_id from reviews where rownum <= (#{page}*#{listAmount})) where rn > (#{page}-1)*#{listAmount} order by review_id desc
select inventory_id,product_id,product_size,quantity, stocked_date,product_color,discontinued from inventories where inventory_id=#{inventoryId}
SELECT DISTINCT product_color FROM inventories WHERE product_id = #{productId} order by product_color
